subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: There are moments when the Scottish course actually feels as if it is on the water, and nowhere does a golfer feel closer to the spray and the tides than on the tee at the ninth hole.
snippet: There are moments when the Scottish course actually feels as if it is on the water, and nowhere does a golfer feel closer to the spray and the tides than on the tee at the ninth hole.
